articles.author: Stephanie Hirschmiller
articles.description: MNTGE's Ethereum NFTs can be redeemed for patches from the likes of Jen Stark and OSF, along with Nyan Cat and Bored Ape Yacht Club artists.
articles.title: Fashion Brand MNTGE's New NFTs Unlock Physical Patches From Noted Artists

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: A Facebook group comprising 10,000 former NatWest customers is taking action against the bank's allegedly opaque debanking practices.
articles.title: NatWest Customer 'Debanked' for Crypto Trading Amid Nigel Farage Row

articles.author: Nicholas Morgan
articles.description: House Republicans are pressing ahead with a bill to regulate stablecoins, but Democrats say that it's inadequate for the task.
articles.title: Stablecoin Bill Stymied, House Financial Services Chair Blames White House

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: The Paraguay mining facility will come online in September, joining Sazmining’s existing facility in the U.S.
articles.title: Sazmining to Open Green Bitcoin Mining Facility in Paraguay, Tap Itaipu Dam

articles.author: Ali Shutler
articles.description: Android and iOS game EF Defense, from developers behind the popular Endless Fantasy game, will deploy on the Ethereum scaling network.
articles.title: 'EF Defense' Mobile Strategy Game Launching on Immutable zkEVM

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: To mark Beatport’s Web3 launch on Polkadot, it's issuing the limited collection ‘NACHTS’ from Berlin-based photographer Mischa Fanghaenel.
articles.title: Iconic Electronic Music Platform Beatport Launches NFT Marketplace on Polkadot

articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: Web2 in the front, crypto in the back; Beam, Eco’s second product launch aims to onboard the “truly mainstream.”
articles.title: Andreessen-Backed Eco’s Newest Crypto Wallet Marries ‘Web2 With Web3’, Says CEO

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: The collab between ConsenSys-backed Palm Network and Polygon aims to drop costs and improve efficiency for creators and brands entering Web3.
articles.title: Palm Network to Launch NFT Creators' Platform on Polygon Supernet

articles.author: Mattis Meichler
articles.description: Already established in the U.S., Securitize is now set to issue its first tokenized security in the European Union.
articles.title: Tokenization Firm Securitize Kicks Off European Campaign in Spain

articles.author: Connor Sephton
articles.description: Best known for teaming up with Mastercard to customize credit cards with blue-chip NFTs, hi hints that brands in the Animoca family could be next.
articles.title: Metaverse Giant Animoca Brands Plunges $30M Into Crypto 'Super App' hi

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: The DOJ told the court Wednesday that charges related to political donations weren’t mentioned in the original extradition by the Bahamas.
articles.title: DOJ Doesn't 'Intend to Proceed' With Campaign Finance Charge Against Sam Bankman-Fried

articles.author: Mattis Meichler
articles.description: 'Themes and Variations' sold out in just an hour, with trading volume on the secondary market jumping as high as 457 Ethereum.
articles.title: Sotheby's Historic Dutch Auction: Vera Molnár's Generative NFT Artworks Fetch $1.2M in Ethereum

articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: According to crypto investigator ZachXBT, the hack may be linked to Lazarus due to the group’s "very distinct fingerprint on-chain."
articles.title: North Korean Hacker Cell Lazarus Allegedly Behind $60M Alphapo Hack

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The Democratic candidate for U.S. President also blasted banks for succumbing to political pressure.
articles.title: Robert F. Kennedy Jr. Says He Bought 14 Bitcoin for His Kids

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Shown at Solana's PlayGG event, Alchemy: Battle for Ankhos taps into AI and blockchain alike for a decidedly unique concoction.
articles.title: 'Alchemy: Battle for Ankhos' RPG Mashes Up Discord, Generative AI, and Solana NFTs

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: The unreleased generative imaging tool doesn’t shy away from nudity and gore, and puts MidJourney on notice.
articles.title: Uncensored and ‘Insane’: A Look at OpenAI’s Secret Image Generator

articles.description: Decrypt's Jason Nelson interviews Alchemy: Battle for Ankhos Creative Director Alex Finden at the Solana PlayGG event in San Diego, California.
articles.title: Building a Discord Game with AI and Blockchain: 'Alchemy: Battle for Ankhos' Creative Lead Alex Finden

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: A crypto developer has built a browser tool for Twitter aficionado to restore the classic logo.
articles.title: Don’t Like Twitter’s ‘Ugly’ X Brand? Get the Bird Back With This Extension

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Witnesses claim there is first-hand evidence of the existence—and possession—of alien spacecraft.
articles.title: Accusations of a Government Cover-Up Dominate Congressional UFO Hearing

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Cool Cats and Aku are in the mix for the new Collectible Avatars NFT drop, with prices ranging from a couple bucks to $200 apiece.
articles.title: Reddit Launches More Polygon NFTs—After Already Minting 18 Million Avatars

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: Federal prosecutors accused Bankman-Fried of trying to discredit a witness in talking to the New York Times.
articles.title: Feds Want Sam Bankman-Fried Jailed Until Trial Over Alleged Witness Tampering

articles.author: Nicholas Morgan
articles.description: Democratic lawmakers claim Republicans are catering to large crypto companies and undermining the SEC.
articles.title: Democrats Attack New Crypto Bill for Weak Consumer Protections

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: A team at MIT says injecting tiny disruptive bits of code can cause distorted deepfake images.
articles.title: Researchers Pitch ‘Immunizing’ Images Against Deepfake Manipulation

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The streaming giant is offering up to $900,000 for roles in R&D and machine learning.
articles.title: Netflix Pushes Ahead with AI Hiring Despite Industry-Wide Strike

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The Federal Reserve today said it would continue to hike interest rates—but Bitcoin and Ethereum did not immediately move.
articles.title: Bitcoin Holds Steady After Federal Reserve Raises Rates to 22-Year High

articles.author: Ki Chong Tran
articles.description: We explore what tokenization is, how it works, and how it's revolutionizing the way assets can be issued, managed, and traded.
articles.title: What Is Tokenization?

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: After laying off 73% of its team, Star Atlas developer ATMTA says it remains focused on building out the Solana-based NFT space game.
articles.title: 'Star Atlas' CEO After Massive Layoffs: 'Nothing About Our Vision Has Changed'

articles.author: Nicholas Morgan
articles.description: Coinbase has been tapped by BlackRock and others to help launch a Bitcoin ETF, and its stock price has felt the bump. But the company still faces significant risks.
articles.title: Coinbase Is the Real Winner in the Bitcoin ETF Race—Here’s Why

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Android and iOS game Legends at War, endorsed by "Game of Thrones" star Hafthor Bjornsson, will get an NFT-powered version on Avalanche.
articles.title: 'Legends at War' Mobile Game Launching on Avalanche Subnet

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: Binance's issues in Europe continue to escalate as the crypto exchange faces another regulatory setback in Germany.
articles.title: Binance Withdraws Crypto License Application with German Regulator BaFin

articles.author: Nicholas Morgan
articles.description: The aim is to create an environment where more TradFi institutions can get involved in DeFi minus the risks facing retail investors.
articles.title: Italian Central Bank-Backed Hub Taps Polygon, Others to Bring TradFi Deeper Into DeFi

articles.author: Mattis Meichler
articles.description: Vera Molnár's new generative art series reimagines typography with algorithms, marking the kickoff of Sotheby's Gen-Art Program.
articles.title: From Early Computers to NFTs: Vera Molnàr's Pioneering Art Journey at Sotheby's

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: The Haun Ventures-backed Highlight, which debuts today, claims to be the first "open access" generative art NFT platform on Ethereum.
articles.title: Ethereum Generative Art Challenger Highlight Takes on Art Blocks

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: Each day brings “a legal question which there’s no precedent for,” says top lawyer Eleanor Hughes, as Binance works to build trust in the industry.
articles.title: Binance’s New General Counsel On the Cutting Edge of Crypto Regulation

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: South Korea is ramping up fight against crypto crime with the launch of multi-agency virtual asset crime investigation unit.
articles.title: South Korea Rolls Out Interagency Investigation Unit to Tackle Crypto Crime

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi,Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: LDO holders currently hold the keys to the bank, which could put the Lido Finance’s staking community at a disadvantage.
articles.title: Lido Finance DAO Mulls Introducing New Dual Governance Model

articles.author: Ryan Gladwin
articles.description: Ultra Arena features on-chain digital identities and reputation, with an aim to help amateur players rise up the ranks—and maybe even go pro.
articles.title: Crypto Gaming Startup Ultra Launches Esports Platform With Token, NFT Prizes

articles.author: Connor Sephton
articles.description: The education sector saw 320 times more cryptojackings in the first half of 2023 than last year—and weirdly, market downturns spark more attacks.
articles.title: Ransomware May Be Dying Out, But Cryptojacking Is Up 399%: Cybersecurity Firm

articles.author: Stephanie Hirschmiller
articles.description: Apparel brand Lacoste's new digital storefront provides an immersive shopping experience—and NFT holders get full access.
articles.title: Lacoste's New Virtual Store Has Exclusive Perks for Ethereum NFT Holders

articles.author: Mattis Meichler
articles.description: Despite a tinge of sadness, the designer behind the iconic blue bird is nonetheless optimistic about Musk’s new direction for Twitter–or, X.
articles.title: Twitter’s Original ‘Blue Bird’ Logo Creator Martin Grasser Says ‘It Had a Great 11-Year Run’

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: CEO of the dYdX Foundation Charles d'Haussy unpacks the decision behind moving one of the largest decentralized exchange protocol's over to its very own chain built on Cosmos. A key driver, he told Decrypt at this year's EthCC event, was that instead of launching on a rollup or another layer-1, launching a fully customized chain will allow dYdX to fine tune the network for its product's needs.
articles.title: 'Big Respect Between Ethereum and Cosmos Developer Communities': dYdX Foundation CEO

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Marin Tvrdić, a business development contributor to the Lido DAO, sat down with Decrypt during this year's EthCC to break down how the liquid staking protocol has managed such a massive lead, how it plans to keep that lead, and the protocol's new dual-governance tokenomics.
articles.title: Ethereum Staking Solution Lido 'Had Perfect Product Market Fit' at Launch, Says DAO's Biz Dev Contributor

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: OpenZeppelin's security solutions architect Michael Lewellen sat down with Decrypt to discuss how the industry can become a little safer for users at this year's EthCC Paris. The key? Introducing security standards across the industry so folks know what an audit actually means and where risks lie, be it bad faith actors or poor implementation.
articles.title: What's Going to Stop All the DeFi Hacks? 'Standards,' Says OpenZepplin Security Architect

articles.description: Ev.io is a web-based first-person shooter that's free to play, but lets NFT holders earn in-game currency that can be redeemed for Solana (SOL). Decrypt contributor Ryan Gladwin shares his review of the fun throwback to Quake-style blasting, albeit with a modern crypto twist.
articles.title: 'Ev.io' Game Review: Earn Solana While Blasting Enemies

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Account abstraction this, smart wallets that. Discussions at EthCC Paris about improving user experience have pointed at industry leader MetaMask as an example of what not to do. But that may soon change, with a host of updates and optimizations coming to crypto's number one wallet, said its product lead Alex Jupiter. It still may take some time, though, before these changes take effect.
articles.title: 'Moving Fast and Breaking Things Isn't the Web3 Ethos': MetaMask Product Lead

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Argent co-founder Julien Niset told Decrypt at EthCC Paris that he wants to make crypto wallets disappear. Or at least how they're currently conceived. From clunky seed phrases to a stiff user experience, Argent hopes to make using crypto a little less intimidating and a whole lot more fun.
articles.title: Scaling Smart Wallets on Starknet 'Was The Winning Combination', Says Argent Co-Founder

articles.description: Mighty Action Heroes is the flagship blockchain title from Mighty Bear Games. But is the browser-based battle royale shooter worth checking out? Decrypt's Kate Irwin offers her thoughts and a first look at the upcoming game.
articles.title: Inside Mighty Action Heroes' Open Beta

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin playtests Dr. Disrespect and Midnight Society's first-person shooter Deadrop and shares the latest game updates, as well as her opinions on the game in development. Currently, Deadrop offers Polygon Founders Pass NFTs with no other crypto plans revealed just yet.
articles.title: Dr. Disrespect's 'Deadrop': Early Access Gameplay From Snapshot VI

articles.description: In the wake of EA Sports and Fortnite creator Epic Games embracing Nike's NFT platform, Mythical Games CEO John Linden tells Decrypt's Andrew Hayward how quickly he expects to see more major traditional game publishers enter the blockchain space and how quickly the industry will scale.
articles.title: 'More and More' Game Publishers Will Embrace NFTs: Mythical Games CEO

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin plays Gran Saga: Unlimited's second community playtest, reports her findings, and offers her opinion and insights on the upcoming game, which will offer optional Aptos NFTs.
articles.title: Gran Saga Unlimited Early Access: Inside the Anime MMORPG on Aptos

articles.description: 100 Thieves content creator and gamer Moe also goes by "Yassuo" online after his favorite League of Legends character. Decrypt's Kate Irwin asks him about 100 Thieves' future crypto plans and whether Moe thinks creators like xQc and Pokimane might ever come around to blockchain games.
articles.title: 100 Thieves' Moe Says Blockchain Games Will 'Eventually' Be Accepted by Livestreamers

articles.description: Splinterlands Cofounder Matt Rosen tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about how the game has evolved over its five-year history and why he doesn't listen to the FUD around crypto.
articles.title: "Games of the Future Are Going to Be Different," Says Splinterlands Cofounder

articles.description: Plai Labs Marketing Director Payton Kaleiwahea tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about player response to the combat game Champions Ascension in development, which offers arena combat, raid bosses, AI landscape features, and more.
articles.title: Inside Champions Ascension: Like 'For Honor' with NFTs?

articles.description: Former Activision Vice President Michael Lee is now the SVP of Growth at Matter Labs. At the 3XP gaming conference, Lee sat down with Decrypt's Kate Irwin to discuss crypto gaming and give his predictions for the industry.
articles.title: Ex-Activision VP Michael Lee: Gaming Is Crypto's 'Killer App'

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin goes to Burbank, California for a behind-the-scenes tour of AMGI Studios, the developers of upcoming game My Pet Hooligan.
articles.title: Behind the Scenes with AMGI Studios and My Pet Hooligan

articles.description: Legend of Arcadia Executive Producer Andy Lee tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the game and why they switched from EVM to new protocol Sui.
articles.title: Why Legend of Arcadia Chose Sui Over EVM Chains

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin shares a first look at Delabs' upcoming lawn mower racing game Rumble Racing Star, which offers a large cast of quirky characters pulled from the worlds of Bored Ape Yacht Club, Pudgy Penguins, and more.
articles.title: Rumble Racing Star Game Preview: Is This Mario Kart With NFTs?

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin chats with Laguna Games about why the team chose to move away from an offer with WB Games to develop a Game of Thrones licensed title—and made Crypto Unicorns instead.
articles.title: Why Laguna Games Turned Down 'Game of Thrones' for Crypto Unicorns
